info.name: Workflowy - Task Lizard
info.description: This is a hodgepodge of ideas I found in other userstyles (see below) for workflowy, then augmented to handle specific tags with # and @ that I use to see at-a-glance what seems important. I put everything I have to do, have done, meetings, phone calls, skype, procedures, miscellaneous lists, ideas, programming tasks, etc. into workflowy, all within an overall Journal > Year > Month > Date > format,
info.additionalInfo:
v 1.3 No longer requires MISC CSS userstyle. Included section of MISC CSS userstyle as changes between the 2 userstyles was problematic, resulting in problems displaying properly
v 1.2 if you make local changes to the userstyle 1) Misc CSS .. below, be sure to make a trivial (e.g. add a space or comment) white-space change to this userstyle as the next step. Otherwise, the Misc CSS userstyle will take over the overflow (the battle for control of the !important on the textarea) and a mess will result!
v 1.1 muted the red (@) and green (#) default colours 
v 1.0 derived in large part from:
1) Workflowy.com - Misc CSS Changes (https://userstyles.org/styles/58901/workflowy-com-misc-css-changes) (seanwcom https://userstyles.org/users/129155) thanks!
2) WorkFlowy Custom Tag Colors (https://userstyles.org/styles/112356/workflowy-custom-tag-colors) (rawbytz https://userstyles.org/users/288871) Thanks!
